game_description: This is a demonstration for developers of the capabilities of the Interaction SDK for fast-action fitness types of apps. A short experience that lets you get a fun workout trying to punch, chop and block using your real hands!
review_1: Smooth hand tracking with great music! This experience was awesome! Hopefully more music will be added in the future!!!!
review_2: Nice demo highlighting the new hands 2.2 update!
review_3: This is a great showcase and could be a full game. Developers need to be adding hand tracking if it is this good.
review_5: Really cool idea here. Hand tracking sets it apart from the other games in the exercise genre. Hit register doesn't seem to be very accurate when doing the chop motions - I nail it perfectly every time on the easier difficulty but according to Move Fast I'm missing roughly one out of every three. I'm not. Also, there is a slight but detectable delay between actual hand movement and when it appears in the game. Other than that, this is a nicely designed workout game with a ton of potential. I'm excited to see more.
